subject: Sales
title: Time Pressure as a Weapon
description: Learn Time Pressure as a Weapon in one minute.

hook.text: A deal must close by Friday or the budget vanishes. Every demand suddenly becomes negotiable.

buildup.text: Deadlines create urgency. The side under time pressure almost always makes bigger concessions.

discovery.text: Studies show 80% of concessions happen in the final 20% of any negotiation's timeline.

twist.text: Artificial deadlines work too, until the other side calls the bluff and nothing actually expires.

climax.text: If you're under time pressure, hide it. If the other side is, be endlessly patient.

punchline.text: The patient negotiator almost always wins.

quiz.question: When do most concessions happen in a negotiation?
options: In the final 20% of the timeline
